name: test_ntp_server
description:
arrange: set up the chrony charm with a specific NTP source configuration.
    act: send a simple NTPv4 request to each unit.
    assert: ensure each unit responds correctly to the NTP request.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: set up the chrony charm with a specific NTP source configuration.
act: send a simple NTPv4 request to each unit.
assert: ensure each unit responds correctly to the NTP request.
